name: roblox-asset-reuploader
description: A tool to easily transfer animations and audios from one account to another.
author: Hakai

scripts.build: tsc && pkg dist/src/index.js --compress GZip --target win-x64 --output "dist/Roblox Asset Reuploader.exe"
scripts.build:zip: npm run build && tar -a -c -f "dist/Roblox Asset Reuploader.zip" -C dist "Roblox Asset Reuploader.exe"
